sources.title: Hawk of Powder River
sources.description: Cowboy hero Eddie Dean versus The mysterious Hawk, and her outlaw gang.

metadata.Plot: Vivian as the Hawk is the secret leader of an outlaw gang. She wants the Chambers ranch and after Chambers is killed she sends her men to kill his daughter who is arriving on the stage. Eddie breaks it up and later foils a robbery attempt by the gang. Finding a hat at the scene, he marks it and leaves it hoping it will turn up again.
metadata.Actors: Eddie Dean, White Cloud, Roscoe Ates
